text: Nimen yingdang zhidao: Nimen suo huode de zhanlipin, wulun shi shenme, dou yingdang yi wu fen zhi yi gui an la, shizhe, zhiqin, gu'er, chipin, luke, ruguo nimen quexin an la he liang jun jiaofeng er zhen wei pan fen zhi ri, yiji wo suo qishi wo de puren de jixiang. An la duiyu wanshi que shi quanneng de
